analysis.description:
CoinFiAirdrop.sendAirdrop (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- token.balanceOf(airdropRecipients[i]) == 0 || allowDuplicates

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#355-363):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#356-357)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#359-360)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#376-385):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#377-379)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#379)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#381-384)

CoinFiAirdrop.sendAirdrop (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,airdropRecipients[i],AIRDROP_AMOUNT) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol)

CoinFiAirdrop.sendAirdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.balanceOf(airdropRecipients[i]) == 0 || allowDuplicates (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol)

CoinFiAirdrop.sendAirdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transferFrom(owner,airdropRecipients[i],AIRDROP_AMOUNT) (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol)
BasicToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#126-128) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#62) should be declared external

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/1/0x3136ef851592acf49ca4c825131e364170fa32b3.sol#1): it allows old versions
